name: places/ChIJOduIDwD3wokRnZ5BURncVYc
adrFormatAddress: 2702 Broadway, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: My appointment was cancelled due to arriving late. The appointment was for my daughter at 10am and we were waiting to check in with two people ahead of us on line so we were there before the 10 min grace period. The fact that this office only allows patient a 10min grace period is absurd. Not to mention that two doctors that my family was seeing left the practice in less than a year. I Will be switching primary care facilities for myself and children.

text.text: My appointment was cancelled due to arriving late. The appointment was for my daughter at 10am and we were waiting to check in with two people ahead of us on line so we were there before the 10 min grace period. I Will be switching primary care facilities for myself and children.

originalText.text: I needed a new PMD and came to see Dr Beechum. Firstly, the reception area was very clean. The receptionist was kind and curtious. Dr Beechum was very thorough and professional. She did a full assessment and asked alot of necessary questions as a PMD should. Missy drew my blood and found my vein immediately. She was very fun to talk to and seriously the highlight of my visit :) The exam room was a bit cold, but extremely clean. I felt very comfortable there. I would highly recommend this location.

text.text: I needed a new PMD and came to see Dr Beechum. Firstly, the reception area was very clean. The receptionist was kind and curtious. Dr Beechum was very thorough and professional. originalText.text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about ColumbiaDoctors Primary Care located in Manhattan Valley. Dr. Elizabeth Lee is absolutely phenomenal and I am so thrilled to have established care with her! The nurses & medical assistants are equally wonderful - everyone is so kind, caring and efficient. Further, their office space is so lovely, it's very clean + well-kept. The proximity of this office to Columbia University's campus is great, too!

text.text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about ColumbiaDoctors Primary Care located in Manhattan Valley. originalText.text: As others have said, to be told I missed my appointment (that I had waited MONTHS for) for being 10 minutes late is a disgrace. Hello??? I had to take 3 trains and over an hour to get to their office —plus take time off from work! We live in NYC—trains run late! I will not be going back to this practice—and doctors wonder why women don’t keep up with their medical care.

originalText.text: Wow how could this place only had one review! This place is awesome! Spacious, stylish, private and staff and doctors are all very friendly. The doctor listened to my need, A nurse and a assistant came out after the visit to do blood draw and loggia up referral, very nice and patient. They are kind to my four years old daughter too. Each patient room is spacious and quiet, wait time is within 1 minute. Would recommend to everyone.
